Ok i had no idea how to go about it so instead of brainstorming i thought id just post a quick topic

I want to change so as soon as they WALK away from where they r standing or remove the item the go back to thier normal selves. I would really prefer to have it so as soon as they walk it cahnges back

Current code =

if ((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2680) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4359)) { //stength untrimmed npcId = 1289; npcId2 = npcId; isNpc = true; specGFX(255); plrText = "I can bench a lot with my strength!"; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2008, 03:07:38 pm[/size][hr]ok im 1 sec closer,
at the bottom i added

else { setAnimation(0x35A); isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
